meanings.sent1: The unselected toy remained on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The unselected apples were left behind at the store.
meanings.sent3: The unselected socks decided to start a rebellion in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: The unselected path through the forest seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent5: The unselected flower stood out among the rest with its unique color.

meanings.sent1: The unselected candidate graciously accepted the outcome.
meanings.sent2: The unselected team member still contributed to the project.
meanings.sent3: The unselected politician decided to become a professional juggler instead.
meanings.sent4: The unselected star in the sky seemed to twinkle brighter than the rest.
meanings.sent5: The unselected gem sparkled in the sunlight, unnoticed by many.

meanings.definition: Not highlighted or chosen for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The unselected text blended in with the background.
meanings.sent2: The unselected option remained grayed out on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The unselected paint color decided to throw a surprise party for the walls.
meanings.sent4: The unselected ingredient in the recipe added a mysterious flavor.
meanings.sent5: The unselected book on the shelf seemed to call out for attention.
